content.prompt: If the stones are thrown at the same time and air resistance is negligible, which of the following is true?

choices.label: The two stones reach the ground at the same time with the same speed.
The two stones reach the ground at the same time but with different speeds.
Stone A reaches the ground first, but the two stones have the same speed just before they hit the ground.
Stone A reaches the ground first and has greater speed just before hitting the ground.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
